description:
A HDD/SSD utility software which supports a part of USB, Intel RAID and NVMe.


- Added Dark Mode Menu support
- Improved Realtek RTL9220DP support
- Improved JMicron JMS586 support (Beta)
- Improved Buffalo SSD-SCTU3A support
- Improved Toshiba HDD support
- Added AoiLight/AoiDark theme [Aoi Edition]
- Added ShizukuLight~nijihashi_sola/ShizukuDark~nijihashi_sola theme [Shizuku Edition]
- Updated Core Library (Project Priscilla)
- Updated language files
